content:
Sure, here are some papers related to the examples I provided:

1. "Automatic coffee bean inspection system using computer vision and machine learning." (J.C. Santos et al., 2021)
2. "Real-Time Monitoring of Coffee Brewing Using Computer Vision." (R. M. Gómez et al., 2021)
3. "Recognizing Coffee Cups: A Deep Learning Approach." (J. Yu et al., 2019)
4. "Robust estimation of coffee roast levels by image analysis." (M. Sugimoto et al., 2014)
